activities: Womble Carlyle is a full-service law firm, serving regional, national and international clients in a wide range of industries.  In serving our clients, we may receive and collect personal information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client data.  Data may be manually or electronically processed.
recoursemech: The firm will monitor adherence to the Principles and address questions and concerns regarding their adherence.  WCSR will cooperate with the EU Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner and comply with the advice of such authorities.
